sentences.en: According to our intelligence, further attacks were planned.
sentences.cn: 根据我们的情报，还会有更进一步的攻击。

sentences.en: Everything he writes demonstrates the acuteness of his intelligence.
sentences.cn: 从他的文笔可以看出他思维敏捷。

sentences.en: He deserted from army intelligence last month.
sentences.cn: 上个月他从陆军情报机关开小差跑了。

sentences.en: He served during peace-time as an intelligence officer in the Navy.
sentences.cn: 他在和平时期担任海军情报官员。

sentences.en: He's the equal of his brother as far as intelligence is concerned.
sentences.cn: 论智力,他和他哥哥不相上下.

sentences.en: Intelligence and cunning emanated from him.
sentences.cn: 他透着一种智慧和狡黠。

sentences.en: Intelligence has [ have ] reported that enemy is planning a new attack.
sentences.cn: 情报 人员报告说敌军正在策划发动新攻势.

sentences.en: Of course, literacy isn't the same thing as intelligence.
sentences.cn: 当然，识字和智力是两码事。

sentences.en: Our Intelligence Service was untrained, cumbersome, and almost wholly ineffectual.
sentences.cn: 我们的情报部门人员缺乏训练，机构臃肿，简直毫无用处。

sentences.en: She first moved into the intelligence services 22 years ago.
She has shown no abnormality in intelligence or in disposition.
sentences.cn: 她在智力或性情上都未显示出任何反常.

sentences.en: She used her good looks to compensate her lack of intelligence.
sentences.cn: 她利用她漂亮的外表来弥补智力的不足.

sentences.en: The criminal was very astute and well matched the detective in intelligence.
sentences.cn: 这个罪犯非常狡猾,足以对付侦探的机智.

sentences.en: These magnificent ancient buildings demonstrate the great intelligence of the labouring people.
sentences.cn: 这些壮丽的古代建筑显示了劳动人民的高度智慧.

sentences.en: To be good at the game, you need a reasonable level of intelligence.
sentences.cn: 要想把这种游戏玩好，需要一定的智力水平。

sentences.en: Too bad he used his intelligence for criminal purposes.
sentences.cn: 他把聪明都用在了犯罪上，太可惜了。

words.tran_cn: 智能的；聪明的；理解力强的
可理解的；明了的；仅能用智力了解的
智力，理解力；知识分子；思维逻辑领悟力；智力高的人
知识分子；凭理智做事者
[心理]智力；情报工作；[图情]情报机关；理解力

phrases.tran_cn: 情绪智力；情商；情绪智商
情报部门；情报工作；智能型服务
市场情报；市场信息；巿场资讯

trans.tran_en: the ability to learn, understand, and think about things
